final.utterance: List document IDs, document names, and document descriptions for all documents.
final.sql: SELECT document_id ,  document_name ,  document_description FROM Documents

interaction.utterance: Show information for all documents and their ids .
Also show their document names and document descriptions .
interaction.sql: select document_id , document_name , document_description from documents

final.utterance: What is the document name and template id for document with description with the letter 'w' in it?
final.sql: SELECT document_name ,  template_id FROM Documents WHERE Document_Description LIKE "%w%"

interaction.utterance: Show the document name for all documents and their description .
Which one has description with the letter 'w ' in it ?
interaction.sql: select document_name from documents where document_description like value

interaction.utterance: Show its name and template id .
interaction.sql: select document_name , template_id from documents where document_description like value
